member.name: T:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.INestedMarkupExtension
member.summary: Markup extensions that implement this interface shall be able to return their target objects. They should also implement a SetNewValue function that properly set the value to all their targets with their own modification of the value.

member.name: M:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.INestedMarkupExtension.GetTargetPropertyPaths
member.summary: Get the paths to all target properties through the nesting hierarchy.
member.returns: A list of combinations of property types and the corresponsing stacks that resemble the paths to the properties.

member.name: M:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.INestedMarkupExtension.UpdateNewValue(XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.TargetPath)
member.summary: Trigger the update of the target(s).
member.param: A specific path to follow or null for all targets.
member.returns: The output of the path at the endpoint.

member.name: M:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.INestedMarkupExtension.FormatOutput(XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.TargetInfo,XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.TargetInfo)
member.summary: Format the output of the markup extension.
member.returns: The output of this extension for the given endpoint and target.

member.name: M:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.INestedMarkupExtension.IsConnected(XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.TargetInfo)
member.summary: Check, if the given target is connected to this markup extension.
member.returns: True, if a connection exits.

member.summary: This function returns the properly prepared output of the markup extension.

member.name: M:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.NullExtension.UpdateOnEndpoint(XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.TargetInfo)
member.summary: This method must return true, if an update shall be executed when the given endpoint is reached. This method is called each time an endpoint is reached.
member.returns: True, if an update of the path to this endpoint shall be performed.

member.name: T:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.ParentChangedNotifier
member.summary: A class that helps listening to changes on the Parent property of FrameworkElement objects.

member.summary: An attached property that will take over control of change notification.

member.summary: Get method for the attached property.
member.returns: The target's parent FrameworkElement object.

member.summary: Set method for the attached property.

member.summary: The callback for changes of the attached Parent property.

member.name: F:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.ParentChangedNotifier.OnParentChangedList
member.summary:
A static list of actions that should be performed on parent change events.
- Entries are added by each call of the constructor.
- All elements are called by the parent changed callback with the particular sender as the key.

member.name: F:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.ParentChangedNotifier.element
member.summary: The element this notifier is bound to. Needed to release the binding and Action entry.

member.name: M:XAMLMarkupExtensions.Base.ParentChangedNotifier.#ctor(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Action)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The element whose Parent property should be listened to.
The action that will be performed upon change events.

member.summary: Disposes all used resources of the instance.

The values are lists of tuples, containing the target property and property type.
